name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: Hello, [color=#FF0000][i]FOOL,[/i][/color] have you come to stop me?

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: A futile effort, my godly power far exceeds your own!

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: Despite it all, your resolve remains unwavered

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: Show me your tenacity, Champion of Freya!

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: Show me your strength, Champion of Thor!

name: [center]Loki[/center]
text: Show me your valor, Champion of Tyr!
